mapper.insert: insert into materiel_plan (id, construction_id, materiel_id, planned_time, planned_num, charge_user_id, note_taker, record_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{constructionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{materielId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{plannedTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{plannedNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update materiel_plan set construction_id = #{constructionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, materiel_id = #{materielId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, planned_time = #{plannedTime,jdbcType=DATE}, planned_num = #{plannedNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, charge_user_id = #{chargeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note_taker = #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, construction_id, materiel_id, planned_time, planned_num, charge_user_id, note_taker, record_time from materiel_plan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, construction_id, materiel_id, planned_time, planned_num, charge_user_id, note_taker, record_time from materiel_plan
